title: The Right Situation For The 76ers & Nets?
description:
Israel Gutierrez, Sarah Spain and Joon Lee debate what they make of the latest updates on Ben Simmons & James Harden and if Kyler Murray’s Instagram post convinces them that he is cool with the Cardinals.
